pr_title: MULE-18905: PollingSourceWrapper clears the content of the wrong object store

timeline.message: clear idsOnUpdatedWatermark when a watermark higher than updatedWatermark is found
fixed regression and added test case

timeline.bodyText:
You are never comparing the item watermark to the updated watermark.
Let's say that currentWatermark is 5, and updatedWatermark is 10.
Maybe recentlyProcessed has the items with id A and watermark 5, and the same item A but with id 7 comes for processing, you are changing the updated watermark to 7. In the next poll, an item of watermark 8 would be accepted.
timeline.author: ndinu

timeline.bodyText: I think index and polls should not be static fields.
timeline.author: ndinu
